TopicTitle: Show off your screen shots here, no Kerbol glare shot please.

Articles.Content:
If Kerbol (sun) is viewable in your screen shot YOUR CRAFT CAN NOT BE SEEN (you are showing your craft from the unlighted side) so WHAT IS THE POINT OF POSTING IT? A black rectangle with Kerbol glare does not look cool or show off your most probably, most excellent craft, no one can see it.

"The dark side" is a cool phrase not a cool image.

Dedicated to Forum members who wish to SEE others most excellent crafts.
We have a screenshot thread. Just because there is something in it that you dont like, does not really ratify a new thread.

Well, just to play devil's advocate here, a screenshot does not need to display your craft to be good or artistic. A screenshot of the sunset over Minmus is a lot more creative that just snapping a plain shot of your fully-lit craft, unless you're specifically showcasing your design instead of going for aesthetic and artistic screenshots.

But just to inform you, there is already a sticky for screenshots located here
If you're suggesting this is a terrible screenshot because it doesn't include a fully illuminated spacecraft, then I have to disagree.

If you're suggesting this is a terrible screenshot because it doesn't include a fully illuminated spacecraft, then I have to disagree.

Quote, there's the screenshot thread for all kind of pictures not only for spacecraft
Thread closed, please use the official thread here.
